SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.*, ROWNUM rnum FROM ( select m.com_material_code, c.com_material_name, c.com_material_size, c.com_material_unit, sum(m.mat_inout_quantity)as material_stock, c.com_material_safety_stock
from mat_inout m, com_material c
where c.com_material_code = m.com_material_code AND m.mat_inout_gubun = 'INOUT002'
AND m.com_material_code LIKE '%' || #{comMaterialCode} || '%'
group by m.com_material_code, c.com_material_name, c.com_material_size, c.com_material_unit, c.com_material_safety_stock ORDER BY m.com_material_code ) a WHERE ROWNUM <= #{lastIndex} ) WHERE rnum >= #{firstIndex}
